summary: To make government lobbying more transparent, paid lobbyists and firms must: Register with Congress File reports on who lobbied and what they did each quarter File semiannual reports on political contributions We assess compliance with these requirements in a sample of reports. As in past years, most lobbyists filed but some omitted information. For example, 23% of quarterly reports listed lobbyists who didn't disclose their...
title: 2023 Lobbying Disclosure: Observations on Compliance with Requirements
